Open the staging.new.expensify.com website. 2. Tap on "Settings" on the bottom of the screen. 3. Tap on "Profile" 4. Scroll down to "Date of Birth" and open the tab. 5. Tap on the year, to open the years list. 6. Use device´s back button to return to calendar. 7. Verify you land on the calendar tab again. ## Expected Result: When opening the years list when setting date of birth and using device´s back button, the user should be redirected to the calendar tab again. ## Actual Result: When opening the years list when setting date of birth and using device´s back button, the user lands on the profile tab again and not on the calendar. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: Standalone - [ ] Android: HybridApp - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: Standalone - [ ] iOS: HybridApp - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/61ac56c2-bead-48e4-a323-acfddffe6a2e [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
